game.name: Toram Online
game.genres: Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 중후하고 웅장한 판타지가 매력인 MMORPG! 당신이 주인공이 되어, 전국의 플레이어와 MMO 세계를 모험하자!!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The MMORPG of a massive and magnificent fantasy! Let's explore the MMO world!

reviewHighlights.text: logged in played with friend friend joinned guild me join guild life is slave to guild get paid by guild life good
If you grew up on PS2 era RPGs, you'll probably like this game. I'm only to Lv 40 in 3-4 days on intensive playing -at 32 hours in. It's not a perfect...
